definitions.title: vb. Pilpēl
definitions.body: , whence Inf. [[בְּסַאסְאָהּ]] (MT [[בְּסַאסְּאָה]]) Is 27:8 = by driving her (it) away (conj. fr. ‖[[בְּשַׁלְּחָהּ]]), acc. to Hi Ew Di Du Che:Hpt Am RV:m; > = [[בִּסְאָה סְאָה]] by the sₑ’āh, the sₑ’āh, i.e. (Ges:§ 123 c, 133 k) by exact measure Vrss (not LXX), Ges De cf. AV RV, which is prob. Rabbin. conceit. (On format. cf. [[טאטא]], and v. Ges:§ 55 f. Sta:§ § 112 a Anm. 2; 238.)
